name: Elf Adventure
description:
Introducing Elf Adventure; the latest run and jump game that is very easy to play but very hard to master.

Elf Adventure is a new game for you and for all your family, it will challenge your brain and skills to see if you will be able to complete each level.

The objective of our adventure game is to take control of the character in a dangerous dungeon environment, run and jump till you reach the 

exit door to complete the current level and go to the following one.

But, keep in mind that your mission will not be that easy because there are many obstacles and you should not hit them or you will lose.

Features:

+ Our retro game is very easy to play and it doesn’t require any special skills.

+ A very well designed classic environment that will let you keep playing for hours nonstop. You will never feel bored.

+ Easy and Hard levels.

+ Hardcore platformer.
